title: Trump’s Tariffs on Solar, Hospitality Tech, Netflix Rides Growth
itunes:title: Trump’s Tariffs on Solar, Hospitality Tech, Netflix Rides Growth
description:
Brian Eckhouse, Bloomberg News Renewables Reporter, discusses the pros and cons of President Trump's tariffs on the solar industry. James England, Senior VP at Fourth, explians how machine learning can benefit restaurants and hotels. Bret Schroeder, Partner at PA Consulting, talks about the future of health care in the shadow of potential reforms. Shira Ovide, Bloomberg Gadfly Tech Columnist, and Lucas Shaw, Bloomberg News Entertainment Reporter, look at Netflix value and sustainability. And we Drive to the Close with Aaron Kennon, CEO at Clear Harbor Asset Management. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
